characters.name: Kristoph Gavin
characters.description1: Boss at Gavin Law Offices. A first-rate defense attorney, and my trusted mentor.

characters.name: ??? → Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: My first client. Just standing in front of this guy makes me nervous...
characters.description2: Pianist at the Borscht Bowl Club. Formerly an ace defense attorney of some renown.

characters.name: Shadi Smith
characters.description1: The victim in this case. A traveler, only recently back in-country.

characters.name: Winston Payne
characters.description1: The prosecuting attorney. For all his experience, he lacks a certain presence...

characters.name: Olga Orly
characters.description1: The witness in this case. A Russian waitress at the Borscht Bowl Club.
characters.description2: A professional swindler. Hired by the victim to destroy Phoenix Wright's reputation.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: A pianist who can't play a lick. Formerly an ace defense attorney of some renown.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: Future stage magician in training. Apparently, the daughter of Phoenix Wright.

characters.name: Dr. Hickfield
characters.description1: A suspicious-looking fellow, though he apparently is Mr. Wright's physician.

characters.name: Guy Eldoon
characters.description1: Proprietor of the noodle stand "Eldoon's Noodles".
characters.description2: Proprietor of "Eldoon's Noodles". Former doctor, and rival to the victim.

characters.name: Plum Kitaki
characters.description1: Wife to the 4th Kitaki Family boss. Busy cleaning up paint spilled by her front gate.

characters.name: ??? → Alita Tiala
characters.description1: Mysterious woman encountered outside People Park. She seemed concerned...
characters.description2: Woman who requested that I defend her fiancé.

characters.name: ??? → Ema Skye
characters.description1: Detective in a white lab coat. Apparently in an extremely touchy mood.
characters.description2: Head detective on the case, obsessed with forensic science. Mood: touchy.

characters.name: Wocky Kitaki
characters.description1: The defendant. Heir to the Kitaki Family empire, and Alita Tiala's fiancé.

characters.name: ??? → Klavier Gavin
characters.description1: Spitting image of Mr. Gavin. Blew in like the wind and left like the wind.
characters.description2: Spitting image and younger brother of Mr. Gavin. An acquaintance of Mr. Wright.
characters.description3: Star prosecutor, lead in a gold-record-selling band, and Mr. Gavin's younger brother.

characters.name: Pal Meraktis
characters.description1: The victim. Director of the Meraktis Clinic. Died pulling the noodle stand.

characters.name: Winfred Kitaki
characters.description1: 4th Boss of the Kitaki Family. Wocky's father. Wears an apron. (Don't ask.)
characters.description2: 4th Boss of the Kitaki Family. Wocky's father. Trying to get out of the gangster business.

characters.name: Wesley Stickler
characters.description1: Junior in Science at Ivy University. The witness. A man concerned with "truth".
characters.description2: Junior in Science at Ivy University. The witness, and a panty-snatcher.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: A pianist who can't play a lick. Formerly an ace defense attorney of some renown.

characters.name: Trucy Wright
characters.description1: Future star magician, and Phoenix Wright's daughter. Fond of her Mr. Hat trick.

characters.name: Klavier Gavin
characters.description1: Star prosecutor and leader/vocalist for the rock group, the Gavinners.

characters.name: LeTouse
characters.description1: Lamiroir's interpreter. His first name is "Romein".
characters.description2: Shot during the performance. He died after leaving me with his last words.
characters.description3: Victim in this case, actually an undercover Interpol agent.

characters.name: Lamiroir
characters.description1: Singer lauded as the "Siren of the Ballad", from the tiny country of Borginia.
characters.description2: Famed singer from Borginia. Hid the fact that she is blind.

characters.name: Machi Tobaye
characters.description1: Lamiroir's favorite pianist. He is blind.
characters.description2: Blind pianist. Arrested on suspicion of having shot Mr. LeTouse.
characters.description3: Defendant in this case. Concealed the fact that he could actually see.
characters.description4: Defendant in this case. Turns out he isn't blind and can understand English.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: Detective obsessed with forensics. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Daryan Crescend
characters.description1: Guitarist for the Gavinners. His day job is as a detective in Criminal Affairs, Div. 3.

characters.name: Valant Gramarye
characters.description1: Famous magician, often on TV. Fond of exaggeration.
characters.description2: A famous magician, responsible for the illusion used in the concert.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: A pianist who can't play a lick. Formerly an ace defense attorney of some renown.

characters.name: Trucy Enigmar → Trucy Wright
characters.description1: Future star magician, and Phoenix Wright's daughter. Fond of her Mr. Hat trick.
characters.description2: Zak Gramarye's daughter. Already dresses the part of a magician to the hilt.
characters.description3: Future star magician, and Phoenix Wright's daughter. Fond of her Mr. Hat trick.

characters.name: Vera Misham
characters.description1: My client, apparently. I know nothing other than her name and mailing address.
characters.description2: The defendant. Accused of poisoning her father, Drew Misham.
characters.description3: Arrested on suspicion of poisoning her father, Drew Misham. Currently on trial.

characters.name: Ema Skye
characters.description1: Detective obsessed with forensics. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Drew Misham
characters.description1: Painter known for his illustrations. Poisoned at Drew Studio.
characters.description2: Painter. Summoned to this trial by the authority of Prosecutor Gavin.
characters.description3: Painter known for his illustrations. Poisoned at Drew Studio.

characters.name: Valant Gramarye
characters.description1: Popular stage magician. His overly loquacious manner can get annoying.
characters.description2: Zak's young partner and understudy. The two of them on stage was a sight to see.
characters.description3: The most popular stage magician today. Once performed with his partner, Zak.

characters.name: Spark Brushel
characters.description1: Freelance journalist. Can smell a scoop from miles away.

characters.name: Klavier Gavin
characters.description1: Star prosecutor and leader/vocalist for the rock group, the Gavinners.

characters.name: Shadi Enigmar → Zak Gramarye
characters.description1: My client in this case. Usually goes by his stage name, "Zak Gramarye".
characters.description2: Trucy's father. Defendant in a trial, vanished just before the verdict was announced.

characters.name: Magnifi Gramarye
characters.description1: The victim in this case. Died after being shot in the head while in the hospital.
characters.description2: Founder of Troupe Gramarye, and a great magician. Mentor to Zak and Valant.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Apollo Justice
characters.description1: A greenhorn defense attorney I happened to meet. I call him Apollo.

characters.name: Kristoph Gavin
characters.description1: Incarcerated at the Central Penitentiary for the murder of Shadi Smith.

characters.name: Thalassa Gramarye
characters.description1: Trucy's mother. Still missing after her sudden disappearance.
characters.description2: Trucy's mother, and the daughter of Magnifi Gramarye. Whereabouts currently unknown.

characters.name: Mike Meekins
characters.description1: Bailiff responsible for security at the trial where Zak Gramarye vanished.

characters.name: Shadi Smith
characters.description1: In reality, the magician Zak. Murdered at Russian eatery: the Borscht Bowl Club.
